name: Employee of the Month (pikoifishy)
description:
(Made for Paint Jam 2021!)

You're working at the Store Mart, a run-down little convenience store at the outskirts of town. Your co-worker is out with a broken everything and your boss is on vacation, so the only person around to get everything running today is... you!

So hop to it!

===========================================================

(This game, while completely playable, is currently in a demo state. Further updates will be released to expand upon the experience presented here, so if you enjoy the demo, stay tuned!)

===========================================================

Troubleshooting / FAQ:
 Q: Will this work on all Linux computers?
 A: Probably! We've coded it on a Linux computer and playtested it on both Linux and Windows, but nothing is guaranteed - if the game doesn't work with your build, please feel free to leave a comment describing both the bug you encountered and your build and we'll try to look into it!

 Q: Will this be ported to Mac?
 A: Nope! None of us know how to do it! Sorry!

 Q: I'm stuck (physically)?
 A: Oops! Please leave a comment telling us where you got stuck, what command you used, and what you're playing on so we can squash the bug! After that, you should be able to type "go outside" to escape wherever you have ended up.

 Q: I'm stuck (mentally)?
 A: Here are some hints:
       - Remember, you are an employee!
       - Three or more sets of numbers is called a 'code'!

Q: Do all of the items do something?
 A: No! But all the items do have funny flavor text that I worked hard on, so it's still worth looking for all of them! :)

 Q: Why are you using so many exclamation points?
 A: I'm very excited!
